sub_title: Ph.D. ; Forest Cultivation & Town Landscape Designs /Voronezh state Academy forestry engineering, Voronezh, Russia -1985
summary:
	AbdulSattar Salih Al-Mashhadani has a Ph.D. in Forest Cultivation, Selection, Seed growing & Town Landscape Designs.
	He is a senior Agricultural (Forester & Horticultural) Engineer and Associated Professor. 
	Lastly, he was invited by Parsons International Limited to participate in the preparation of a study on afforestation in KSA (the final report was submitted in November 2022).
	He was employed as Landscape Expert in Parks and Recreation Facilities Division (PRFD) with Municipality of Abu Dhabi City (ADM) in UAE and with several distinguished consulting companies (Seconded to Abu Dhabi Municipality), 
	He served in many universities as academic member (lecturer, assistant and associated professor).
	He has over 37 years’ experience in Research in the Field of Forestry; Silviculture; Afforestation; Reforestation; Desertification; Gardening; Landscape Conservation; Planning Projects; General & Plant Ecology; Construction of Plant Nurseries, establishment of multi-purpose Shelterbelts and Windbreaks. 
	Periodic contributing in development, assessment and revision the proposals, concepts and the studies of the urban landscape projects (such as in the attachment)*. 
	Al-Mashhadani has excellent communication skills and strong abilities in training, consulting, data analysis and organisational skills.

	Key Projects include various studies, technical and scientific reports and activities; substantial amount of publications and printed articles on related fields.

company.name: Parsons De Leuw, Cather International Ltd. (Seconded to Abu Dhabi Municipality)

profile_positions.location: Municipality of Abu Dhabi City , Abu Dhabi, UAE.
profile_positions.company: Parsons De Leuw, Cather International Ltd. (Seconded to Abu Dhabi Municipality)
profile_positions.description:
	Participating in meetings and lectures with foreign delegations . 
	Contributing in many activities, workshops and courses related to the PRFD concerns within
        AD Municipality and beyond; 
	Representing ADM in local and national committees responsible for preparing national reports
        aimed at meeting the State requirements and obligations towards the international 
        organization (Such as; the Committee to Combat Desertification and the Subcommittee on 
        climate change..etc). 
	Preparing and updating the standards of Abu Dhabi landscape design guideline, 
	Submitting and publishing technical, illustrated brochures, scientific articles and studies on 
        the concerns of PRFD according to work requirements.
	Evaluating the materials, products, activities of local and foreign companies and research 
        bodies that related to PRFD requirements; design, execution and maintenance of the 
        landscape projects; 
	Review and revision of landscape project proposals, design from developers and 
        documentations for O&M contracts with the PRFD work team in accordance with the 
        standards and local considerations of PRFD guidelines in addition to the technical and vital 
        considerations associated with vegetative cover.; 
	Suggest any proposal that would raise and develop the level of performance.
profile_positions.title: Resident Engineer (Landscape Expert)

profile_positions.description: As above. Shares and contributes in reviewing and evaluating the landscape projects (in particular the soft landscape)... and also in submitting and reviewing the proposals of studies and researches, which related to the development of park’s practices (Care and maintenance of the urban vegetation).
profile_positions.title: Landscape Expert

profile_positions.location: Municipality of Abu Dhabi City , Abu Dhabi, UAE.
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for: horticultural field research and investigation specific to Abu Dhabi’s environmental conditions (salinity, drought, high humidity, pollution etc.); review of available new plants; production, updating and management of forest plantation horticultural manuals and books including supplementary documents in Arabic and English; liaison with UAE Universities and research bodies; site inspection of landscape, maintenance and forest works; on-site inspection of horticultural trial works and product testing; shares and contributes in reviewing and evaluating the landscape projects (in particular the soft landscape) .. And also in submitting and reviewing the proposals of studies and researches, which related to the development of parks practices (Care and maintenance of the urban vegetation).
Enriching biological databases; design review of drawings with respect to plant schedule and selection; developing the specification of exotic and local plants; agricultural works in the fields of forest stands, green shelterbelts, gardens and nurseries; all topics related to arboriculture processes.
